Html:
Using the latest 2.2.0.6 beta, Enhancement shaman cannot wield 2 handed weapons or a shield. I am manually editing the itemfilter.xml to include them, doesn't work though.

Based on this, I imagine Enh shaman is in alpha and not useful at present at all.

That is because you'd have to be amazingly clueless about how to play an Enhancement Shaman if you wanted to use a two hander or a shield. I WILL NOT be adding this to the model, in fact I specifically took 2h & shields OUT of the model. Despite the fact an Enhancement Shaman can use 2h and shields why on earth would you cripple your dps by taking either.

Quite the opposite of being "alpha and not useful at present at all" it would be seriously broken and useless if I included two handers or shields.
